description: A notification that is sent when the subscriber
if found to have violated his enforce rule. This
indicates that this subscriber was found to be
over consuming resources. If the enforce rule
associated with this subscriber has a enforced QoS
parameter set configured, the trap also indicates
that the QoS parameter set of this subscriber are
changed to the enforced QoS parameter set.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-CABLE-QOS-MONITOR-MIB::ccqmEnfRuleViolateNotification CISCO-CABLE-QOS-MONITOR-MIB::ccqmEnfRuleViolateMacAddr s EXAMPL CISCO-CABLE-QOS-MONITOR-MIB::ccqmEnfRuleViolateRuleName s EXAMPLE CISCO-CABLE-QOS-MONITOR-MIB::ccqmEnfRuleViolatePenaltyExpTime s EXAMPLES CISCO-CABLE-QOS-MONITOR-MIB::ccqmEnfRuleViolateByteCount u 9999
